rev.comment: Rm graphic; not used in this olympics and fails [[WP:NFCC]] #10c regardless
rev.diff:
Line 1: Line 1:
At the '''[[1924 Summer Olympics]]''' in [[Paris]], only three events in '''[[sailing]]''' were contested, a large decrease from the fourteen events contested at the previous Games in 1920. The Olympic monotype races were held from July 10, 1924 to July 13, 1924 in [[Meulan]], while the two other classes were held from July 21, 1924 to July 26, 1924 off the coast of [[Le Havre]].
At the '''[[1924 Summer Olympics]]''' in [[Paris]], only three events in '''[[sailing]]''' were contested, a large decrease from the fourteen events contested at the previous Games in 1920. The Olympic monotype races were held from July 10, 1924 to July 13, 1924 in [[Meulan]], while the two other classes were held from July 21, 1924 to July 26, 1924 off the coast of [[Le Havre]].
